column2: "There's a strange voice echoing inside my head. I can't make sense of what's going on because of it..."
"Ah, I see... I'm confused because of you. If I can just get rid of you...!"
"Then... try to erase me."
"What?"
"If you're a Dark Falz, then you should be able to do it without hesitation."
"But, if you really are my sister, Yuku, then you won't be able to do it."
"Rash, meddlesome, that short fuse, and that recklessness... and that kindness."
"Enough with the pranks! I am Dark Falz! Dark Falz [Apprentice]!"
"Frail, insignificant ARKS like you, just one or two of you I can send flying -- I should send flying!"
"I should... but..! Why can't these hands weave power anymore?!"
"Well, of course! It's because you're a fake."
"Fakes can't do anything. Searching, breaking... you can't do anything. Manipulating Darkers is all you can do."
"Aah~ so boooring. You really are just leftovers, huh?"
"Mhmm. Disappointing. Just a failure."
"So dull, just like a wet blanket. At the very least, you should be able to break something."
"I'd like to see if you can even do that... Imitation [Apprentice]."
"You're..."
"Dark Falz [Elder]..."
"Xiao urged me to rush here and so I ran as fast as I could, but what is with this situation?"
"Seeing fellow Dark Falz fight each other has to be a historical first."
"What are you doing, [Elder]?"
"Do you plan on allying with ARKS? Do you plan on betraying us?"
"That question should be yours to answer, [Double]. Why did you enslave [Apprentice] and [Loser]?"
"No, answering is useless. You never had any intention of \"comradery\" from the start."
"ARKS and Dark Falz are irrelevant. I desire only conflict, and the following instinct. I act for that reason alone."
"Before all, from my very core -- my instincts! They roar with the desire to slaughter you!"
"Really...? to hear that from a Dark Falz..."
"We're surprised to hear that. We don't need impure Dark Falz like you guys."
"Did you forget our purpose? The resurrection of the [Profound Darkness]?"
"Did you forget our purpose? To become the [Profound Darkness]?"
"You guys that don't understand... are not Dark Falz."
"You guys that don't understand... are just fakes."
"Fakes like you, we should have just eaten from the start."
"So we'll kill everything."
"So we'll erase everything."
"Ho-ho ho! It seems like it's time for the copies to play."
"Do not interfere, ARKS. My mark this time... is only them."
"Ha! Don't make me laugh, [Elder]. That's ARKS' job! Isn't that right, <%me>?"
"Afin, take that nice lady and get out of here. Melphonsina..."
"I will fight. Please allow me to fight this time!"
"I'll not repeat myself. Do not get in my way."
"Quest progress has been saved."
